content: शाश्वत {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (ती|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [शश्वद् भवः अण्] {@--1@} Eternal, perpetual, everlasting; शाश्वतीः समाः <ls>Rām.</ls> (= <ls>U. 2. 5</ls>) ‘for eternal years’, ‘ever more’ 'for all time to come'; <ls>U. 5. 27</ls>; <ls>R. 14. 14.</ls> {@--2@} All. --तः {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of Śiva. {@--2@} Of Vyāsa. {@--3@} The sun. --तं Heaven. --तं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} Eternally, perpetually, for ever.
